company_info.Company Description: Bosco Facility Management is into the Facility services providing sector.The majority of our work is the service of Corporate Offices, Malls, Schools, Hospital,Hotels, Commercial and Industrial premises.

api_data.job_title: Asst Manager   SEM  Search Engine Marketing

jd_information.description: · 5-8 Years of relevant experience as below· Salary: +/- 75K per month depending of Experience + Incentive· Awareness about updated various content marketing platforms of the Market Research Industry.· On-Page And Off-Page SEO experience for increasing the web traffic.· Google Adwords (Search & GDN) campaign management· Google Editor expertise· Face book Ads , Bing Ads campaign management, Remarketing campaign management,· Product Listing Ads campaign management· Lead generation campaign management· Google Analytics data analysis and reports.· Psd Mockup to Html(Js and jquery)· Wordpress development· Payment gateway integration.· Experience of team handling of minimum 5 Years· Motivate and handle team players of different specialization i.e Developers, SEO, PPC, CONTENTWRITING, DESIGNING
